h1: Calories in a 1/4 Cup of Blueberries
assumptions: Fresh, raw blueberries; 1 cup ≈148 g, so 1/4 cup ≈37 g; no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged blueberries.

quick_answer.text: A 1/4 cup of fresh blueberries provides about 21 kcal and 5 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a 1/4 cup of blueberries?
What are the carbs in 1/4 cup blueberries?
faqs.a: About 5.4 g total carbs, with 0.9 g fiber and 3.7 g sugars.

faqs.q: Are blueberries low in fat and protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1 g fat and 0.3 g protein per 1/4 cup.

faqs.q: Do blueberries have cholesterol or sodium?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 mg cholesterol and <1 mg sodium per serving.

faqs.q: How does portion size affect blueberry calories?
faqs.a: Full 1 cup has ~84 kcal; scale by weight or volume for accuracy.
